p.d: Conrad suddenly reappears from Rita's past, inviting her to come and sing with him in a club in the South. Rita is torn between staying in Saint-Prospere with her friends and spending the winter in Mexico with Conrad. Meanwhile, the annual baseball tournament brings Zoël and Terri together... Directed by: Jean-Marc Piché (season 1, Canada, 2017) Screenplay: Patricia Léger Cast: Patricia Léger (Rita Melanson), Marie-Jo Thério (Yolande LeBlanc), Marcel-Romain Thériault (Lomer Dupuis), Marc Lamontagne (Edmour LeBlanc), Raphaël Butler (Ferraille Gaudet), Claire Normand (Gilberte Cormier), Gabriel Robichaud (Zoël Bourgeois), Bianca Richard (Terri Cormier) Genre: comedy
